# contentLayoutGuide

**Instance Property**

The content layout guide provides the layout area for the UITabBarController unobscured by the tab bar or sidebar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentLayoutGuide: UILayoutGuide { get }
```
title: contentLayoutGuide
